item.title: How I made this Github page
item.description: R / Blogdown / Hugo The website you are looking at is made with R and blogdown. Blogdown allows to use the static website generator Hugo with R Markdown documents (*.Rmd) instead of only pure markdown (*.md). So one can easily integrate R code which is rendered like a HTML R Markdown document. The theme used here is Minimo. Screenshot of the Minimo theme with default colors Github pages This website hosted on Github.
